fieldUpdates.description: This will clear the Closed Auto Comments so user can update with new comments
fieldUpdates.name: Clear Auto Closed Comments

fieldUpdates.name: DR : 180Days Extn : Update Exp Date
DR : Is Submitted For 180Days Extn : F
DR : Is Submitted For 180Days Extn : T

fieldUpdates.description: If Networking Pod Partner is 'Mellanox' then, 'Mellanox Involved' field shall be updated to 'Yes'
fieldUpdates.name: Mellanox Involved Yes

fieldUpdates.description: Used to remove the special pricing approved date for Opportunities that may need to be resubmitted
fieldUpdates.name: Remove Special Pricing Approved Date

fieldUpdates.description: This will set the stage back to NOT SUBMITTED if approval request is recalled
fieldUpdates.name: Set STAGE back to Not Submitted

fieldUpdates.description: Move from Not Submitted to Submitted - pending approval.
fieldUpdates.name: Submitted - Pending Approval

fieldUpdates.description: For use in automated sharing we are updating the Enterprise Oppty Type to then share to segment leaders based on type
fieldUpdates.name: Update Enterprise Oppty Type Text field

fieldUpdates.description: Used to update the OEM Bid Approved Date
fieldUpdates.name: Update OEM Bid Approved Date

fieldUpdates.description: Move Opportunity Stage to In Progress after approval
fieldUpdates.name: Update Opportunity Stage to In Progress
Update Renewal RecordType to SW & Servic

fieldUpdates.description: Used to update SCOPE Opportunities to the In Progress Stage after approval
fieldUpdates.name: Update SCOPE Stage after approval

fieldUpdates.description: to update the status field if Approver rejects.
fieldUpdates.name: update to Closed - Rejected

rules.fullName: Align Sales Leader Category to Opp
rules.description: This is to automatically align sales leader forecast fields to the opportunity if the opportunity is closed won/lost. This kicks off the Sales Leader Process builder.
SDS- 2140, SDS-2872 Need to clear comments ALWAYS when the state changes Closed <> Open
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Automotive_Opportunity', PRIORVALUE(IsClosed) = TRUE, IsClosed = FALSE )

rules.description: Populate "First Expiration Date" field on opportunity with the "Closed Date"
Update primary contact role with "Renewal Contact" when opportunity = CPQ renewal
Update name of renewal opportunity on creation.
DR : When the deal gets terminated send email to Partner

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 7 AND (5 OR 6)
rules.description: Used to automatically flag MCO opportunities
Opportunity field update: set Contracted = True if Stage = Won
rules.formula: SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c != null && RecordType.Name = 'SW & Service Renewals' && ( TEXT(StageName) = 'Renewal Closed Won' || TEXT(StageName) = 'Closed Won' ) && (NOT(ISBLANK( SAP_Delivery__c ) ) )

rules.description: Send NVIDIA Financial Solutions NO email

criteriaItems.value: Review Opportunity with NVFS Resource,Price and Credit evaluation,Term Sheet sent to customer,Create Master Lease agreement,NVFS proposal Finalized

rules.description: Send NVIDIA Financial Solutions YES email
Workflow to auto populate the Next Step Last Modified Date on the opportunity. SDS-2862-Add the logic for new records as well
rules.formula: AND( OR( AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK(NextStep)) ), ISCHANGED (NextStep) ), IsClosed = False )

rules.description: Used to remind users to move forward with approval on their OEM bid Opportunity
Close the opportunity if not updated in last 30days

rules.fullName: Opportunity %3A Alert to Oppty Team Member %28SA%29
rules.description: Send an alert to an SA that they've been included in an Opportunity with a target date
Updating prior close date.
Populating prior probability value
Updating prior stage
Used to help with Special Pricing Requests to remove the approved date if in Stage, 'Awaiting Approval'
When Opportunity = renewal, set Stage = Opportunity Review
How many times (months) has the opportunity close date been pushed?
rules.formula: AND(CloseDate > PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ), OR( MONTH(CloseDate) <> MONTH(PRIORVALUE( CloseDate )), YEAR(CloseDate) <> YEAR(PRIORVALUE( CloseDate ))))

rules.fullName: Update the product currency fields on Oppty
rules.description: For use in updating the product currency fields on Oppty to enable automated sharing based upon Products being attached
